summary:
Is this the start of an invasion?
Or are the barriers between game universes collapsing?!

Only time will tell...
descriptionHtml:
Has Minecraft invaded Skyrim?!
So you guys were literally begging me to continue with my Skyrim adventure.
So I did... But I didn\'t expect this...
Is this the start of an invasion?
Or are the barriers between game universes collapsing?!
Only time will tell...

[youtube]h9ED9pz4oAo[/youtube]

Anyway enough about that.
This is just a quick test I\'ve made with my recent greenscreening.
I\'m currently working on getting the quality just right. Naturally it seems I didn\'t get it quite right in this video but it turned out to be fairly amusing never the less.

What do you guys think?

=====================================

Created by KDStudios for you.
Should you need help or just desire talking with fellow gamers
Visit our site at: http://KDStudios.webs.com

Twitter: twitter.com/kdstudios

=====================================

All footage was recorded and edited by me using Sony Vegas and Fraps

=====================================

Skyrim is created by Bethesda Softworks

Minecraft is created by Mojang
Purchase it at http://Minecraft.net

=====================================

Music Credits:
PokeRemixStudio for the Credits Song
http://www.youtube.com/user/PokeRemixStudio

Gotta catch all the creepers :D
author: KDStudios
